mapper.select: SELECT o.id, o.created_at, o. STATUS, t.serial_num, o.apply_num FROM cs_lease_returns o LEFT JOIN terminals t ON o.terminal_id = t.id WHERE o.customer_id = #{customer_id} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC LIMIT #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT o.id, o.`status` AS apply_status, o.created_at AS apply_time,o.contact,o.phone, t.serial_num, gb.`name` AS brand_name, g.model_number AS brand_number, pc.`name` AS zhifu_pt, m.title AS merchant_name, m.phone AS mer_phone, (TO_DAYS(o.created_at)-TO_DAYS(od.updated_at))/30*g.lease_price as zujin, g.lease_deposit, g.lease_time, g.return_time, g.lease_price, crm.content AS marks_content, crm.created_at AS marks_time, c.`name` AS marks_person FROM cs_lease_returns o LEFT JOIN terminals t ON o.terminal_id = t.id LEFT JOIN goods g ON t.good_id = g.id LEFT JOIN order_goods og on g.id = og.good_id LEFT JOIN orders od on og.order_id = od.id LEFT JOIN good_brands gb ON g.good_brands_id = gb.id LEFT JOIN pay_channels pc ON t.pay_channel_id = pc.id LEFT JOIN merchants m ON t.merchant_id = m.id LEFT JOIN cs_lease_return_marks crm ON o.id = crm.cs_lease_return_id LEFT JOIN customers c ON crm.customer_id = c.id WHERE o.id = #{id}
